title: 94/279/EC: Commission Decision of 26 April 1994 establishing the indicative allocation by Member State of the commitment appropriations from the Structural Funds for the agricultural part of Objective 5a except for those fields covered by Objective 1 as defined in Council Regulation (EEC) No 2052/88 for the period 1994 to 1999
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 26 April 1994 establishing the indicative allocation by Member State of the commitment appropriations from the Structural Funds for the agricultural part of Objective 5a except for those fields covered by Objective 1 as  defined in Council Regulation (EEC) No 2052/88 for the period 1994 to 1999 (94/279/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: For the period 1994 to 1999, the indicative breakdown between the Member States of the commitment appropriations for the agricultural part of Objective 5a, except for those fields covered by Objective 1 as defined in Regulation (EEC) No  2052/88, shall be as set out in the Annex.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 April 1994.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 185, 15. 7. 1988, p. 9.
(2) OJ No L 193, 31. 7. 1993, p. 5.
ANNEX
